Script: Welcome! Technical debt hinders speed and quality. SonarQube helps manage it. Integrate it for code analysis, debt reduction, and production-ready releases. Build a strong foundation, one clean commit at a time.
Hello, I'm Rifat Erdem Sahin. With extensive IT experience, I've delivered many projects globally. At Accenture, I used SonarQube to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Share authentic personal experiences tackling technical debt. Gain insights from yak shaving to scalable solutions, overcoming obstacles in real-world projects.
Integrate SonarQube into workflows using AI. Ensure maintainable, high-quality code for scalable projects. Use AI to connect the dots and enhance development.
Mastering these components empowers you to deliver impactful solutions. Let's dive in and make it work! ðŸŒŸ

Explore real-world technical debt challenges. Achieve daily deployments through hands-on problem-solving with SonarQube. This course uses a real project setting up a SonarQube environment for practical learning.

Leverage AI tools for debugging. Use AI and intuition to break down errors, iterate solutions, and refine your stack. Learn to verify with AI, rubber duck the process, and trust your intuition for better code quality.
Guide through creating a GitHub App, setting up webhooks, and configuring repository access for secure integration.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and confidence to tackle technical debt, deliver high-quality software, and thrive in real-world development environments. Let's get started! ðŸš€
